Looking For Work

01 Mar 2000

Link: www.aquentpartners.com.

Site Description:

\nA member of the American Institute of Graphic Arts, Aquent Partners is a talent agency with a whole lot more to offer.

\n

\nWhether you're looking for work or trying to find someone to work for you while you're sipping martinis at poolside, this is the right place for you.

\n

\nThe site also offers free goodies such as a really helpful Web Skills and price guide that will help you evaluate your talent level and assign a rate and salary to your lot in life. It's also a good motivator to improve your skills.\n

\n

\nTo get to the free tools, click here and enter an email address.\n

\n

\nGood luck getting a better job!\n
